## About Me

I am a Senior Economist at the Irish Fiscal Advisory Council. I am a doctoral candidate in economics at University College Dublin. My research focuses interests are in macroeconomics and fiscal policy. 

## Education

**PhD** in Economics | University College Dublin | Ongoing

**MSc** in Quantitative Economics | University College Dublin | 2018

**BSc** in Economics and Mathematical Sciences | University of Limerick | 2017
